replies.msg: 食James Coutinho 呢啲豬頭骨咪開心囉

拜仁今季最差時試過排第7，慕遜加柏、多蒙特、RB自己自爆，結果又係拜仁被人屌。拜仁買國內球星就拆骨，買國外球星就好撚賤種
多蒙特今季Expenditure: €148.50m，拜仁今季Expenditure: €143.50m(當中有8千萬係買L21)=>屌你老母死拜超財雄勢大
拜仁上季唔買添姆雲拿，宜家去咗車路士，RB實力弱咗，好嗱又係最衰拜仁一家獨大搞臭個聯賽，令其他球隊留唔到星

出多錢：屌你死拜狗攞錢屈人機
出少錢：屌你死拜狗小小錢都計到盡，叫咩撚嘢豪門
免簽：屌你死拜狗又玩免簽搞到人地人財兩失
違約金：屌你死拜狗同個球員夾計贖身逼人地放人，正賤種
同班戇鳩理性討論都係哂氣

quote.msg: 我覺得最撚賤係吸哂其他隊嘅潛力股 成世唔洗翻身
最重要淨係識喺德甲作威作福

pinned.msg:
40m都未夠仲要30m

Manchester City are not expecting Leroy Sane to force a move if an agreement with Bayern Munich cannot be found this summer.


Pep Guardiola confirmed that Sane has made clear his decision to leave the Etihad by turning down a contract extension on a number of occasions, and Bundesliga champions Bayern have been transparent about their interest.

However, City will only strike a deal if they receive a fee well in excess of the £30m that has been mentioned in German media reports. The Blues wanted more than £130m last year and do not believe that either the contract or injury situation of the player, or the uncertainty of the transfer window, warrant such a dramatic drop in valuation.

Sign up to our free MCFC email newsletter

Get the latest breaking Man City news and analysis every day direct to your inbox with our free MCFC newsletter

Sign up here - it only takes a few seconds.

Guardiola spoke of bearing no grudge towards Sane for his decision to choose another adventure after four years at the Etihad, and even if the club are resigned to losing him they do not expect to be forced into a sale this summer.

"Of course when we make an offer to players it’s because we want him, he is a young player with incredible potential," the manager said on Friday.

"He has special quality that is hard to find around the world, but we tried before the injury, we tried before the the surgery and after that but he rejected. He has other wishes and I understand.
